roleset.name: repeat, utter again

role.descr: utterance or action that is repeated
listener when arg 1 is an utterance

example.name: no listener
example.text: In the joint declaration issued after a prayer ceremony held in Istanbul, Pope Benedict and Bartholomew rejected the concept that massacres could be carried out in God's name, denounced terrorism, and iterated that Roman Catholicism and the Eastern Orthodox Church would strive for peace and unity while condemning violence.
example.arg: In the joint declaration issued after a prayer ceremony held in Istanbul,
that Roman Catholicism and the Eastern Orthodox Church would strive for peace and unity while condemning violence.

roleset.note: ITERATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'iterate' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison to 'repeat.' (from iterate.01-v predicate notes)
